RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Proposal frequency
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how frequently a pawn will autonomously try to to make a vore attempt. Pawns may do so as pred or as prey, but, at the time of writing, they will only make vore attempts when they are idle.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Vore apathy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] does not care enough about vore to initiate vore proposals on [PAWN_possessive] own. [PAWN_pronoun] has no qualms about being told to do it, though.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Vore disinterest
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] will seek vore out on [PAWN_possessive] own much less frequently than others.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Passing vore interest
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] proposes vore as frequently as everyone else.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Vore eagerness
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] will propose vore on [PAWN_possessive] own more often than other pawns.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Vore obsession
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is ever-eager for vore, and will propose it on [PAWN_possessive] own twice as much as other pawns.
